website_summaries.verdict: Flower Child" is a very popular costume, and this version is well-designed and affordable.
pros: Material is silky, very wrinkle resistant
cons: The skirt may be too short for some wearers, so we recommend wearing shorts or tights underneath
Not ideal for women with larger busts

customer_reviews.title: Well the guy was good. If I were to get a 2x it ...
customer_reviews.text: This outfit was a hit at the party I attended. I have been losing some weight so I was skeptical as to which size I wanted to order so I went with the 1x. This is because I AM a busty gal. Well the guy was good. If I were to get a 2x it would of been extremely to big. I did have to take two of my strings to keep the vest inclosed because again my boobs are big but it worked out perfectly. I love the fringe pieces tht came for the boots. Overall great fit and great costume. Also I'm 5'11 so lengtg was great for me with my heel boots
customer_reviews.author: Kyra Harris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: True to fit! I ordered a size large. I'm 5'3 and 150lbs. I wear a size 9 juniors
customer_reviews.author: TaJohnda

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This was better than I expected! I'm 5'7 and the dress was somewhere around 5-6inches above my knee? So I did was another reviewer said and wore black legging pants underneath which I think looked great. The only complaints I would have is the leather parts were very wrinkled from packaging so I did my best to iron them out (the tags say do not iron btw). One side of the vest had jagged cuts. And I had to use safety pins to hold the vest otherwise it would fall to the sides. But I won 1st place at my work contest so I'd say it's a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Williams

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant on getting this just because I was worried about how it would fit. I looked at the other reviews and pictures and went ahead and bought it. I'm about 5'3 and around 140lbs and I got the M/L and it fit perfectly. Like other reviewers mentioned, the boot covers were very long so I went out and bought brown suede closed toe wedges and it looked so nice together. Everyone thought they were actual boots! All of my customers loved my costume that they all HAD to take a picture with me. I have no complaints about this costume!!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice value
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'4, 120 pounds and got a small/medium. Fits well & hugs curves; just a little too short, so I will wear thin leggings under it when I wear it out. Quality is great & it is sewn together well. I had to sew parts of the vest to the dress though, since you want to be able to appreciate the patches, and the vest keeps falling to the side so you can hardly see it. Overall though, this is a great costume at a fabulous price.
customer_reviews.author: Cautious Shopper

customer_reviews.title: To short
customer_reviews.text: Great costume everyone liked it but I had to wear leggings underneath if I said it was short, that would be an understatement. It was so short you could see my whole butt, it's weird because in the front it fit perfectly. I don't enen consider myself that tall at 5'6" I don't know how anyone could wear this without something underneath. Also the "vest" would not stay open correctly so I just tied some of the fringe in the front.
customer_reviews.author: kelly knapik

customer_reviews.title: Great costume for the price.
customer_reviews.text: 5'6 about 180lbs hourglass figure. I wasn't sure which size to get and planned on getting an XL to be on the safe side but it was not in stock. I wound up getting the M/L and it fit well. The material is thin so if you have a belly you will want to wear spanx. I wore tights underneath to make sure I wasn't tugging at the dress all night. It's rather short, barely mid-thigh. I tied some of the fringes in the front together as another reviewer suggested to keep the attached vest closed. Overall this is a great costume and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: SallySue

customer_reviews.title: Big Hit!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the plus size costume and I was a little nervous because the size range seemed kind of crazy to me 16W-20W. I had no idea how it was going to fit. It ended up being a little large (I'm 5'7 about 235 lbs) but I loved it. It was very comfortable, I got tons of compliments and it was a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Maria Adams

customer_reviews.title: Groovy Chick
customer_reviews.text: Attended a decades party where you dressed up in a specific decade. I chose 60s/70s ☺️ Ordered M/ L 5’4 160lbs. The dress fit good but was a little short. I had to grab it through the night as I danced. The headband and shoe tasseled covers definitely helped make the outfit. Very cute and will be saved to wear again!
customer_reviews.author: Discount Queen

customer_reviews.title: Fit Well & Comfortable and Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about buying a Medium/Large. It fit great in the chest but was too short for me (I am 5'9") so I wore it with leggings. It was a comfortable costume and was fun to wear. I bought hippie peace and love tattoos, large loop earrings, a hippie headband with feathers (it comes with a strap of material that matches the top) and I wore a blonde wig with it. The hippie headband kept the wig in place the and hair out of face, which was nice. There were a lot of hippies at the party we went to and it was a fun time.
customer_reviews.author: NinjaMom

customer_reviews.title: Super cute just like pic runs sorta big but I'll ...
customer_reviews.text: Super cute just like pic runs sorta big but I'll make it work if it came in just a small instead of small medium probably would have fit perfect I'm still gonna wear it it's not that notable
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Cute, comfortable, worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute costume! My specs: 190lbs, 40DDD, 31 inch waist, normal pant size of 14, top size of large. This fit loose but not baggy. I wore a pair of maroon leggings and a strappy tank under since it is a thin material. Wore a pair of tan booties to go with the fringe boot covers. Adorable, absolutely recommend !
customer_reviews.author: Real-life Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: A very cute costume and looks just like the pics. It's definitely the typical costume materials still put together well for what it is. I'm 5'8 130 ibs and ordered a S and it fits great. It is short for my height (barely past the bum) so I'm planning to wear something underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Costume! Mistaken Identity
customer_reviews.text: This costume is super cute! I received so many compliments on it! Though, one thing that I found interesting, is that a few people thought that I was costumed as a Native American, not as a hippie, even with my added peace sign jewelry and face stickers? Not sure why that happened, but it did. So, if planning to wear this costume among individuals that are easily offended, maybe consider something else to be on the safe side. Minus one star for mistaken identity.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Fits small but otherwise exactly what’s described.
customer_reviews.text: I’m 61” tall and wear a size 5. I ordered a small/medium that’s suppose to fit up to size 8. The dress is very stretchy and doesn’t have a flattering fit. This fits my 10 year old daughter prefectly and she’s a girl’s size 10. Very cute but be sure to order a size up. Wore this to a Zumba Halloween party, was kind of short but I wore biker shorts underneath it.
customer_reviews.author: niemy5

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Quality is as expected, not the best but really good for what it is; a costume. Colors are bright. The only thing I did not like is the vest. Its attached and does not have a back. I cut it off and replaced with a full better quality vest. That is the only reason I did not give 5 stars. Size is good.
customer_reviews.author: BeBe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Costume
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and fit perfectly. I'm 5'4" 125 pounds and the Small/Medium was true to size. The only thing I did to make the outfit look better is I used safety pins to pin the "jacket" part in place so it looked more aesthetically appealing. I got tons of compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Karlene

customer_reviews.title: Cutest Hippie Outfit Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I wore this outfit for our JA Bowlathon event which happened to be themed Love, Peace and Bowl. The outfit was super cute and I received many compliments. The dress was not worn by itself since this was a company event so I paired it with a thick pair of leggings. All in all it worked out well.
customer_reviews.author: SamBGoo

customer_reviews.title: Very cool and inexpensive costume but beware it’s the cheapest form ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cool and inexpensive costume but beware it’s the cheapest form of polyester like all costumes and I was overheating in it at work in an office with A/C. I wore blue faux denim legging and my own brown boots that looked like the fringe was attached to them. Beware of the overheating though.
customer_reviews.author: Rosy

customer_reviews.title: SM/MED fit problems
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'2" and about 135lbs, top heavy, small hips and butt. In the front it was definitely short, but in the back if I bent over just a tiny bit, I'd be flashing people! Although the dress did fit my bust and waist area, the attached vest is so small it would not cover my bust unless I taped it or sewed it, so it crumpled up under my armpits which kept me from seeing the cute designs. My legs are short so the boot covers were too long, dragging on the floor when positioned just below my knee. The material is as expected, the thin, costume-type polyester.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Fits as advertised and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a size 5 and Small fit perfectly! I love this costume... it’s just perfect making it fun and sexy without being too revealing! Definitely recommended for all conservative ladies out there!
customer_reviews.author: CocoaJan

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It’s going to be awesome for my costume party at work. It fits like it should! I’m a medium large and it works great! It’s way cheaper then the ones in store. Over all a good product!
customer_reviews.author: Amber G.

customer_reviews.title: Fun Outfit!
customer_reviews.text: Love! Love! Love this outfit! I’m a size 6 and bought a M/L. It fit perfectly! I received so many compliments and couldn’t get enough of it. Even my twin (second picture) looked amazing! Only thing is that if you have big boobs, the vest doesn’t close.
customer_reviews.author: Davet

customer_reviews.title: Lots of compliments!
customer_reviews.text: loved this...Know that the dress material is simply thin flimsy material but I paired it with black tights and with the leg fringe it looked great and I was much more comfortable....
customer_reviews.author: turksandcaicos

customer_reviews.title: Hit of the "70" party !
customer_reviews.text: Went to a "70" party and was a hit with this costume . It's was not too light but not too heavy ... just perfect . For the price and quality this was a great buy . I would purchase again with no hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: SHERRIE

customer_reviews.title: Vest doesn't continue on back, looks cheap from behind
customer_reviews.text: Really cute from the front, but the vest doesn't continue around the back, so it looks really lame from behind. I'm super embarrassed to wear it to my party now. UPDATE: I wore it to my party anyway, and I got so many compliments!! So maybe it isn't as horrible as I fear it looks like from behind.
customer_reviews.author: S. Yee

customer_reviews.title: Great Fast Costume.
customer_reviews.text: The matching "vest" with "boots" were a hit. The vest is just the front and connected to the dress. The leggings went over my shoes and looked like boots. I have thin legs and the elastic was a little tight so watch for that. The dress looks short in the picture and it is.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and realistic :)
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this for myself for Halloween, but the vest was just a little too small so I re-gifted to my Sister for Christmas, and she loved it :)
customer_reviews.author: Sara Jane Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 15 year old daughter. We live in the north east and yes its cold here . She used this for spirit week. Light weight
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Jones

customer_reviews.title: Bleach-like stain on lower back of dress
customer_reviews.text: Wore this to a friends Halloween party. Fit perfectly, it is short though (I’m 5’6, 130 lbs) so either wear shorts underneath or wear leggings! Would have given this 5 stars but when I received the costume in the mail it had a bleach-like stain on the back close to the booty lol... was a little disappointed with that but overall fit very well and I got a lot of compliments ! Also, I used a safety pin to close the vest otherwise others and myself would not have seen the peace sign/flower patches on the vest if I left it open the way it was.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Great colors and loved the material. It was a little big and I had to pin it back for pictures. I’m 5’1 and 120lbs and I normally wear a medium because of the “chest” area, so I got the medium/large. However, the size on this runs a little big. I could of worn the next size down. Over all a super cute costume and I got lots of compliments on it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comes exactly like the photo!
customer_reviews.text: CANT BELIEVE PEOPLE USED TO DRESS LIKE THIS Has to be a size bigger forsure. Thank God I got medium. It’s a little short so you’d have to wear leggings or shorts underneath ... Very unique. ☮️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice costume
customer_reviews.text: I wore this costume to a 70's party and I felt really good in it and got a lot of compliments. I had to wear jeans under because it is thin and if you have long legs or any curves, it will be too short. Overall this was an amazing buy and I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!!!! True to Size
customer_reviews.text: I will add a picture once I wear it on Halloween. It is a Perfect Fit and flattering. I usually wear a Med and I'm 5'2", ordered M/L. Nice material , flattering fit and super cute . Great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: SuzyQ

customer_reviews.title: Great Halloween or 60s/Hippie outfit - Just as described
customer_reviews.text: This was so darn cute - and pretty decent quality for the price. It's definitely re-usable. I had to tack the front of the vest down so it would stay more closed to show off the designs.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Showstopper!!
customer_reviews.text: Wore this to a 70's party. Received a lot of compliments. We one best couple costume. Outfit was a little short in the back so i had to wear shorts underneath. Overall very happy.
customer_reviews.author: 2Dvine

customer_reviews.title: Very short for tall girls
customer_reviews.text: Loved this outfit, however I’m 5’8” 150lbs and this “dress” was just maybe an inch from showing my whole back side. Could not raise my arms and for sure should not wear to a professional work place unless worn as a shirt 😅
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Sa.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous about the length of the dress, but it worked in my favor and I won the overall costume contest.
customer_reviews.author: Shana L. Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Was such a cute Halloween costume!
customer_reviews.text: Was such a cute Halloween costume. I normally wear a 0-2 in dresses, the S/M fit like a 4-6 as expected so it was a little big on me. I used a small belt to cinch the waist. Buy it
customer_reviews.author: C. C.

customer_reviews.title: Live Your Inner Hippie In This Outfit
customer_reviews.text: Loved outfit! The “boot sox” stayed up during four hours of dancing. Had to pin vest to dress so it would stay open. Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Glasier

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit. I love it
customer_reviews.text: Super fast delivery. I was undecided because I didn't know if it would of Fit. So i gave it a try and it fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight material so I didn't get hot while dancing at the Halloween party!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this costume for an adult Halloween party, and it was a hit. One other person dressed alike so we spent a lot of time giving each other the peace sign and just having fun!
customer_reviews.author: Betty Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: SO COMFORTABLE!
customer_reviews.text: Just wore this today. It is so comfortable and for the money, made well enough. Tons of compliments at the party. Also ordered a short afro wig to go with it. Great loose fit. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Roseboro

customer_reviews.title: Great 70's Costume Outfit
customer_reviews.text: I was the high light of the 1970's Birthday Party we threw for my aunt. This costume was absolutely amazing...I received many many comments on how great I looked. It was a perfect fit as well..
customer_reviews.author: Melnswtpee15

customer_reviews.title: smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Typically I wear a medium and sometimes get large if I want something not so snug. This was a medium/large but a little too snug for my comfort
customer_reviews.author: Nancy P.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great costume for the money comes with all the accessories! Got lots of compliments. Sexy but not too showy covers just enough
customer_reviews.author: T. Boogaard

customer_reviews.title: I am 5'4" and 160 lbs and the medium/large fits great.
customer_reviews.text: This is very cute. I am 5'4" and 160 lbs and the medium/large fits great.
customer_reviews.author: The Bragging Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic 70's Costume!!
customer_reviews.text: I wore this outfit to a 70's party and I got so many compliments!! It came with everything in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah S.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but runs very big. I'm a 10/12 in ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute but runs very big. I'm a 10/12 in dresses and this was a 1x because some reviews said it runs small and that is not true. I should have bought the large. It's very true to size.
customer_reviews.author: johanna tobia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: It fits so well!! The back is a little short because I have a big butt but everything else is perfect. But the strings in the boot covers were falling off. I’m on the thicker side about 5’5” 160-170 pounds and I got a medium/large and it fit well
customer_reviews.author: Chelle

customer_reviews.title: It was awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this costumes because it was different, I received so many compliments of how nice this looked on me it was a hit for our HALLOWEEN CONTEST NUMBER 1
customer_reviews.author: Nafeesah Mczorn

customer_reviews.title: Definitely what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. I got this to wear for 70's day at work. The length was really important to me so I was skeptical. However, I put it on and it was perfect. I got tons of compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Catrece C. Young

customer_reviews.title: On the spot for a 60's or 70's party. Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It was totally awesome. Definitely the life of the 60's party. Was a big hit.
customer_reviews.author: rich n seffner

customer_reviews.title: Great costume!
customer_reviews.text: This fits well has a little stretch and should be warm enough with tights. I bought an accessory kits to got with it. (Sunglasses, necklace and headband) the headband that should have came with the outfit didn’t come with it. I didn’t bother complaint because the party I’m wearing it to is in a few days. Other than the missing headband great costume!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: great costume
customer_reviews.text: im 5'5 135lbs and it fit perfect just a tiny short on my thighs lets just say i couldnt really bend down to grab something or else everything would be exposed
customer_reviews.author: Diana A

customer_reviews.title: Love this costume!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this costume for dress up day at school. Very good quality costume at a great price. Very well made and authentic looking.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa G

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT COSTUME
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'3 122 Lb. ordered a small and it fit PEFECT. LOVE this cute outfit. We are going on a 60's cruise. I highly recommend. Bought white boots off amazon, they fit awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Mother (updated by your son)

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute costume for a 70’s party. I have a belly so it didn’t mask it (LOL) but it was still really cute. I wore leggings underneath. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: crystolite

customer_reviews.title: Nice Hippy outfit
customer_reviews.text: Nice Hippy outfit. Worked very well for Halloween. Dress is thin, you may want to wear something under it, I wore leggings. The back of dress doesn't have fringe from vest. The boot covers stayed up all day.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn S.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but very short!
customer_reviews.text: Cute but very short! I'm 5' tall and this hits just a little under my bottom. I can not bend over for sure. Need to wear shorts under to be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Elias

customer_reviews.title: Perfect theme costume
customer_reviews.text: I wore leggings, knowing it would be too short (I am 6ft tall). It was a hit at the costume party I attended (theme Woodstock). I would wear it again.
customer_reviews.author: Dana K.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute.
customer_reviews.text: I love this. Got this for a Halloween party. My husband went as chong from up in smoke so I wanted something similar. Fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Rmt

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: Wore this to a costume party and got so many compliments! The only thing that I didn’t like about this costume was that the material is super thin but I guess that’s expected when you buy Halloween costumes.
customer_reviews.author: candygurl

customer_reviews.title: I would have rated 5 stars cause it fit perfect just is very short it was long enough to ...
customer_reviews.text: I would have rated 5 stars cause it fit perfect just is very short it was long enough to cover my butt just BARELY lol I ordered m/L it runs big I'm a size 16 it fit great with room to spare
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: This costume is awesome. I wish the headband would've come as an ...
customer_reviews.text: This costume is awesome. I wish the headband would've come as an elastic one instead of tying it. But that was a minor issues. Loved the way it fit. Didn't seem to tight anywhere or to short. Loved it. would definitely buy from this company again next years.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I've received tons & tons of compliments about this costume! Wore it for Halloween contest at work! Absolutely gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Junkie

customer_reviews.title: 70's night on cruise
customer_reviews.text: A picture is worth a thousand words. A little thin but overall NICE. A little short as I'm 5'8. But still very nice
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Ann

customer_reviews.title: Cute costume
customer_reviews.text: Cute costume for 60’s theme. Material is kinda thin and wish it had fit a little more snug around the waist. Otherwise would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: j. george

customer_reviews.title: Pleased customer
customer_reviews.text: I wore the costume for a 70s themed birthday party. I originally requested a return because it said 1960s on the package but my friends convinced me no one would know the difference. I was definitely happy & felt cute.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Bear

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement should be stopped
customer_reviews.text: It's mad cheap y'all need to get y'all life together and not get these cheap clothes. They look so cheap that you can tell their cheap just by looking at them.
customer_reviews.author: Yoyo

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this outfit, fast shipping, looked great & received tons of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Tdt1208

customer_reviews.title: Perfect go to costume as a hippie or 60's costumer
customer_reviews.text: Perfect go to costume as a hippie or 60's costumer. Plus size worked for my size 16. Very comfortable and easy to do those wild and crazy soul train dances from back in the day.
customer_reviews.author: LEASE

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy costume idea
customer_reviews.text: This was a last-minute costume idea and I loved it! Fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Great Outfit.
customer_reviews.text: We have a theme every year at work, so I ordered this. I am usually a 10/12 but the only size available was a 1x. I figured I could always belt it- but this must run small as it was perfect- just a bit loose! TONS of compliments!
customer_reviews.author: BRma

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Runs small it is also quite short needed to wear leggings and the vest is attached to the dress but is not the full width of the dress vest is very small
customer_reviews.author: Nikki S.

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: This fits great and it's flattering, I wore it with short boots. Received lots of compliments. Just be aware that it is short though.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: But overall I loved this costume
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a plus size and it was way too big. Had to get 2 inches altered each side and it was still roomy lol. I should have just gotten a large. But overall I loved this costume.
customer_reviews.author: Sisi

customer_reviews.title: Made tooo small
customer_reviews.text: I’m a 10-12 or 13/15 junior. I ordered a 2xl in this and it fits like a shirt. The picture of the idea of fit is false. Not even close to mid thigh, especially from the back...hits just under the butt cheeks...don’t bend over!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’2” and 32D. I’m petite. This fits and wears extremely well. I’m consistently a small in most clothing and this costume fits great. It wears just like a dress I would buy at a store. The dress ends just above my knees.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Sixties Party
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of the outfit, I wore this to a sixties party .
customer_reviews.author: Tisa A. Gartney

customer_reviews.title: Great Costume..Worth the $
customer_reviews.text: Bought as Halloween Costume for my daughter. Looked great. Good quality and my daughter received so many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great 70's outfit!
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect for what I needed. The boot covers were easy to use. A little short in the back, but otherwise fit as expected!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Santos

customer_reviews.title: Great costume!
customer_reviews.text: Got lots of compliments on this costume! It was comfortable but you will definitely need to wear something underneath. I got the S/M and fit perfectly. I’m 5’5” and 115 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would look good on a tall person
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'1 and 170lbs the costume fit right but it was too big on a short person like myself. It made me look frumpy, but overall the costume was really cool!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: comfy, fit perfect, not super tight, exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: this costume is so simple and so cute !!!! i seriously can’t wait until halloween comes around so i can wear it! it’s comfortable, not itchy, and everything comes as picture. I got a small and it isn’t super tight on me to where i’m uncomfortable. it’s pretty loose and i have enough room to dance. 10/10 :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The vest is only sewn onto the front and does not go all the way around the dress which made it look like a little cheap
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a small and I am 5' 5" 145lbs. The small fit perfectly, but was very short, solved this issue with wearing spandex shorts underneath. The vest is only sewn onto the front and does not go all the way around the dress which made it look like a little cheap. Overall I loved the entire outfit and it looked great on! Perfect for the disco party I went to.
customer_reviews.author: Catie aviles

customer_reviews.title: Since this is a small/medium I added a button to the vest under the bust so it fit me better. Over all the quality is all expect
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'3" and 125 lbs. The dress is a few inches above my knee. I had to trim the fringes on the leggings so I wouldn't step on them. Since this is a small/medium I added a button to the vest under the bust so it fit me better. Over all the quality is all expected and it's cute :-)
customer_reviews.author: Lad87nek

customer_reviews.title: It wasn't super tight anywhere
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the mediun/large. I'm 5'0 36DD and haven't lost all my pregnancy weight. About 155 lbs. It wasn't super tight anywhere. A little sheer, but flattering. I juat wore some tight shorts under. Got my daughter the matching toddler one. Everyone loved our Halloween costumes!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Cutest Hippie Costume
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this costume! I kept getting compliments non-stop!! I am 5’1 - 163lbs and I ordered a Medium/Large. Fit a bit loose but nothing some safety pins couldn’t fix. I will definitely be wearing this again! Peace & Love!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, fun costume!
customer_reviews.text: This costume is absolutely amazing for the price! I got sooo many compliments at a Halloween event! Very fun to wear. Great fit also. I am 5'4" and a dress size 8 and the M/L fit perfectly. I did add a safety pin to the front to keep the vest in good position. The boot covers also add a great touch. This is so worth the price and more. So glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandizzle

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cute and easy Halloween costume. Had to wear jeans because the shirt is definitely not mini dress length.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa - Houston, TX

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was an actual vest and not this weird flappy fabric. You have to tie the front strings together or pin it otherwise it doesn't look like a vest.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable but was a bit short on me and I wore faded Jean's with it and then put the leggings on.
customer_reviews.author: EdwDem

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was very simple but once I put my makeup and high heels on I looked spectacular. I even won a contest (third place), although it was also a matter of attitude .P
customer_reviews.author: Laura Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I wore this to my Costume party and I loved it! My family and guests loved it as well! I sewed the vest together a little bit to keep it closed and it was a lil short in the back but I loved it
customer_reviews.author: Jai

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: Package came early and exactly how I expected it. Fits prefect nice material . Ordered it for a Halloween party and everyone loved it . I’m 5’0 137 pounds I ordered a small. But I needed to get tights under it for when I bend over !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool Man!
customer_reviews.text: Really cute! Fitted through the waist but not tight good fit. Some stretch to it also helps. Well made, I will keep this one and wear it again! Really fun and easy to wear!
customer_reviews.author: Goose Girl

customer_reviews.title: Horrible smelly fabric!
customer_reviews.text: I could barely put it on as the smell in the material was so disgustingly horrible! Put it back in the package as quickly as I could to return. It looked cut but the smell was overwhelming!
customer_reviews.author: Wolfie

customer_reviews.title: Theme party
customer_reviews.text: Bought for party, worked great and was able to move around in it no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Carol B.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing I loooove it
customer_reviews.text: Amazing I loooove it. Saving it for another party or when my daughter gets older. Noce, fancy and flirty without the slut look.
customer_reviews.author: cristina

product_meta.title: Fun World Peace & Love Hippie Adult Costume
feature_bullets: Minidress has V-neck, bell sleeves & attached faux suede vest panels
All-over print of hearts and peace signs; Velcro at back of neck
Faux suede fringed boot covers have elastic bands at top
